name: Jagras of the Ancient Forest
request_text: Zorah Magdaros's appearance has brought about changes in the local ecosystem. Head into Jagras territory to investigate, and take them out if necessary.

name: A Kestodon Kerfuffle
request_text: Zorah Magdaros's appearance has driven a herd of Kestodon to new territory. We'll need you to go out and thin that herd of head-butters.

name: The Great Jagras Hunt
request_text: Things I'm not interested in writing in my daily report: "Researchers swallowed whole by Great Jagras." Take it out before I actually have to write it!

name: Butting Heads with Nature
request_text: Blasted Kestodon! Every single time we go out to collect samples, those annoying creatures knock us on our tushes! I wish they'd butt out of our research!

name: A Thicket of Thugs
request_text: One of my field researchers wants to collect brightmoss to study. Only problem is, it's mostly found in caves. Guess what else is mostly found in caves? That's right...Jagras!

name: Fungal Flexin' in the Ancient Forest
request_text: Supplements? At MY Canteen? Pfft! We're all organic, baby! If you need vitamin D, get some Gourmet Shroomcaps! *Unlocks a new Canteen ingredient on first time completion.

name: Bird-Brained Bandit
request_text: The Kulu-Ya-Ku uses its dexterous forearms to carry objects. Left unchecked it's liable to run off with crucial supplies. Step one of rebuilding a secure camp is hunting that thief!

name: Urgent: Pukei-Pukei Hunt
request_text: That Pukei-Pukei is none too pleased to have that slag in its territory. It'll be even less pleased if we send in our scholars to research it. Looks like we have to put it down.

name: The Great Glutton
request_text: I'm sure by now you've seen the way Great Jagras swallow its prey whole. One's been spotted again in the forest. Take it out before one of my researchers gets gobbled up!

name: Camp Crasher
request_text: The other morning one of my researchers woke to his camp having been pilfered by one of those thieving Kulu-Ya-Ku. Do something about it before it ransacks another camp!

name: Snatch the Snatcher
request_text: The Kulu-Ya-Ku uses its nimble forearms to pick up stones and eggs. Monsters that use tools are exceptionally rare. I'd like you to catch one for closer study.

name: The Pain from Gains
request_text: My paw-thritis is acting up again. Years of Palico-ing will do that to you. The best remedy? Good ol' Gajau liver oil! *Unlocks a new Canteen ingredient on first time completion.

name: Exterminator of the Waste
request_text: I need you to go out to the Wildspire Waste and waste a few Vespoids...or as I like to call them, punchin' bags with wings. *Unlocks a new Canteen ingredient on first time completion.

name: The Best Kind of Quest
request_text: Something surely left by Zorah Magdaros was discovered out in the Wildspire Waste. Fifth Fleet hunters: Keep our scholars safe as you escort them out to investigate this new evidence.

name: Sinister Shadows in the Swamp
request_text: A young scholar has gotten separated from his escort out in the Wildspire Waste. Find him and escort him back to base. Neutralize any large monsters that pose a threat.

name: Flying Sparks: Tobi-Kadachi
request_text: Oh, my! That Tobi-Kadachi sure is getting in the way of progress! You hunters will never get a hold of these specialized tools I'm making if I become its dinner!

name: The Encroaching Anjanath
request_text: As we're gearing up to capture Zorah Magdaros, we need to secure Astera as much as we can. It's too much of a risk to have that Anjanath roaming so close to base.

name: Special Arena: Pukei-Pukei
request_text: A new challenger: Pukei-Pukei, the Toxic Tussler, the Lickin' Machine! He won't listen when you say "no tongues"! Think you can go toe-to-toe—er, toe-to-claw with this heavy hitter!?

name: Special Arena: Barroth
request_text: A new challenger: Barroth, the Hulking Headbutt, the Skull- cracker! Lose to this guy, and your name is mud! Think you can go toe-to-toe—er, toe-to-claw with this heavy hitter!?

name: Special Arena: Tobi-Kadachi
request_text: A new challenger: Tobi-Kadachi, the Leaping Lizard, the Bite- master! He'll clean your clock with thunder shocks! Think you can go toe-to-toe—er, toe-to-claw with this heavy hitter!?

name: Scatternut Shortage
request_text: A Pukei-Pukei must have shown up because it's getting more and more difficult to gather scatternuts! We can't study them if the only specimens we can gather are covered in poison!

name: The Current Situation
request_text: Don't touch me! Don't touch me! *zap* I told you NOT TO TOUCH ME! A blasted Tobi-Kadachi has shown up and now I can't touch anything without getting— *ZAP* OUCH!

name: Mired in the Spire
request_text: The Carrier Ants out in the Wildspire Waste are extraordinary engineers. We've been trying to further our research of them but a Barroth appeared and mucked up our entire operation.

name: The Piscine Problem
request_text: The Iron Helmcrab is such a fascinating creature. Just kick it over and out pops a piercing pod! We'd love to study them more but not with a Jyuratodus lurking about!

name: Prickly Predicament
request_text: I'm confident the plants native to the waste will help us grow our Ancient Trees, but I need your help gathering them! *Unlocks a Botanical Research item on first time completion.

name: Gettin' Yolked in the Waste
request_text: You ready for leg day!? GOOD! You'll need 'em when you're running from that Apceros herd! Now go get me my purr-otein! *Unlocks a new Canteen ingredient on first time completion.

name: Landing the Landslide Wyvern
request_text: Barroth dwell in the marshes of the Wildspire Waste, but details of their activities, diet, and nesting habits remain unknown. Catch one to help shed light on the issue.

name: One for the History Books
request_text: At dawn we'll attempt what no one in history has dared: Capture an elder dragon! Make your preparations and proceed to the site. May the Sapphire Star guide us all.

name: Ballooning Problems
request_text: ...I'm sorry, I just retched thinking about that monster's face. Seriously, you'll be doing it a favor...and us too. Hunt it and the Airship Engineer will have everything he needs.

name: Radobaan Roadblock
request_text: The bones covering Radobaan's body are gonna be tough to get through, but if we want to continue our survey of the Rotten Vale, you'll need to find a way!

name: Legiana: Embodiment of Elegance
request_text: You already know how I feel about that intolerable creature. As long as it controls the skies in the highlands, we'll never be able to make our descent. Do take care of it, won't you?

name: Special Arena: Anjanath
request_text: A new challenger: Anjanath, the Jaws of Death, the Stomp- asaurus! He's just stopped by for a quick bite! Think you can go toe-to-toe—er, toe-to-claw with this heavy hitter!?

name: Special Arena: Rathian
request_text: A new challenger: Rathian, the Queen o' Green, the Sky- borne Slasher! Don't get the lady angry; she's poison! Think you can go toe-to-toe—er, toe-to-claw with this heavy hitter!?

name: Special Arena: Paolumu
request_text: A new challenger: Paolumu, the Punishing Puffball, the Fear- igible! It may not be fair, but he's walking on air! Think you can go toe-to-toe—er, toe-to-claw with this heavy hitter!?

name: Special Arena: Radobaan
request_text: A new challenger: Radobaan, the Roto-Ravager, the Grinder! Better dodge fast, or you'll be boned! Think you can go toe-to-toe—er, toe-to-claw with this heavy hitter!?

name: One Helluva Sinus Infection
request_text: Our entire department is out with the flu because of that Anjanath. How could they not be? The Ancient Forest is covered from top to bottom with that nasty mucus!

name: Gettin' Yolked in the Forest
request_text: You ready for leg day!? GOOD! You'll need 'em when you're running from that Rathian! Now go get me my purr-otein! *Unlocks a new Canteen ingredient on first time completion.

name: Royal Relocation
request_text: The samples I need to further my Ancient Tree research are right under a Rathian's nest. Perhaps you can move it for me? *Unlocks a Botanical Research item on first time completion.

name: It's a Crying Shamos
request_text: I almost feel bad for 'em. Those scrawny little monsters don't even stand a chance. Go flex on 'em while I get the goods! *Unlocks a new Canteen ingredient on first time completion.

name: A Tzitzi for Science
request_text: We've heard talk of the Coral Highlands' Tzitzi-Ya-Ku, how it emits flashes of light to blind its enemies. We must know the mechanics involved. Field team, please hunt one for our studies!

name: Sorry You're Not Invited
request_text: This is sort of an odd request but there is a birthday party coming up this weekend and we're in desperate need of balloons. If you could help us out you'd be a real hero!

name: What a Bunch of Abalone
request_text: You ready for arms day!? GOOD! You're gonna need 'em to gather these ingredients I've had my eye on! *Unlocks a new Canteen ingredient on first time completion.

name: White Monster for a White Coat
request_text: Paolumu dwell in the Coral Highlands, but details of their activities, diet, and nesting habits remain unknown. Catch one to help shed light on this mysterious creature.

name: Persistent Pests
request_text: There's a spot that I'm certain hides the secret to new Ancient Tree growth but it's infested with Hornetaurs! *Unlocks a Botanical Research slot on first time completion.

name: A Rotten Thing To Do
request_text: I was work-k-king the Rotten V-Vale when a G-G-Great Girros z-z-zapped me from behind. I g-got out in one piece, but I'm still all t-t-tingly... Finish the j-j-job for me? P-Please!

name: A Bone to Pick
request_text: It's nearly impossible for any of our researchers to study fossils in the Rotten Vale because they keep getting stuck to that blasted Radobaan rolling around down there...

name: On Nightmare's Wings
request_text: Here at the Second Fleet, we've been working to develop new tools to help your hunts, but we need YOUR help gathering the materials. We're counting on you to take this quest!

name: Into the Bowels of the Vale
request_text: ...... Certain death awaits you in the depths, but so does the key to finding Zorah Magdaros. A fair trade-off if you ask me.

name: A Fiery Throne Atop the Forest
request_text: The First Wyverian's not gonna spill the beans about Zorah until we stand on top of the food chain. That means we gotta hunt us a Rathalos! ...Does that mean we have to eat it too?

name: Horned Tyrant Below the Sands
request_text: The First Wyverian's not gonna spill the beans about Zorah until we stand on top of the food chain. That means we gotta hunt us a Diablos! ...Does that mean we have to eat it too?

name: A Colossal Task
request_text: The operation is set to commence in the Everstream. Do everything you can to force Zorah Magdaros out to sea. We must not fail! May the Sapphire Star light our way!

name: Special Arena: Legiana
request_text: A new challenger: Legiana, the Slipstream Striker, the Wing leader! Remember, you can't spell flight without fight! Think you can go toe-to-toe—er, toe-to-claw with this heavy hitter!?

name: Special Arena: Odogaron
request_text: A new challenger: Odogaron, the Muscle Mutt, the Rex Who Wrecks! He'll bite your leg to fetch the stick inside! Think you can go toe-to-toe—er, toe-to-claw with this heavy hitter!?

name: Special Arena: Rathalos
request_text: A new challenger: Rathalos, the Red-Hot Raider, the Fire- starter! Forgive the fireballs; he likes his meals cooked! Think you can go toe-to-toe—er, toe-to-claw with this heavy hitter!?

name: Special Arena: Diablos
request_text: A new challenger: Diablos, the Sandy Stampede, Biggus Diggus! Don't hang around if he's underground! Think you can go toe-to-toe—er, toe-to-claw with this heavy hitter!?

name: When Desire Becomes an Obsession
request_text: They say that Rathalos possess the rarest of gems, but I'm having a hard to time obtaining one. I've already gone through ten or so of them with no luck. Oh well, bring me another!

name: Redefining the "Power Couple"
request_text: Here at the Second Fleet, we've been working to develop new tools to help your hunts, but we need YOUR help gathering the materials. We're counting on you to take this quest!

name: Twin Spires Upon the Sands
request_text: Did you know there's a species of insect that survives by burrowing into Diablos tails? No? Well neither do we! And we won't find out unless you go and bring us one to be sure!

name: A Humid Headache
request_text: This weather is so humid you could cut the air with a great sword! Our department could do with some climate control and I know just the monster that can provide some relief!

name: Gone in a Flash
request_text: Why are you still here? An elder dragon's been spotted and you're just hanging out!? Hurry up before it gets away! *Unlocks a new Specialized Tool on first time completion.

name: Scratching the Itch
request_text: This morning I awoke to a brilliant epiphany! I have an idea for something every hunter needs after a long day out in the field...Odogaron backscratchers!

name: Man's Best Fiend
request_text: I really miss my old pet. The days we spent going to the park, playing fetch. I long for that companionship... that loyalty. Please go out and find me a new one.

name: The Meat of the Matter
request_text: You ready for back day!? GOOD! You'll need to put your back into it to get all the ingredients on this list! *Unlocks a new Canteen ingredient on first time completion.

name: Invader in the Waste
request_text: A Pukei-Pukei in the Wildspire Waste!? As if that's not already weird enough, this one's extra tough. We've gotta get to the bottom of this! Be careful, Partner!

name: Tickled Pink
request_text: A powerful Anjanath's been sighted! Their kind's the gold— pink?—standard for New World monsters. We can't let this chance at an ideal sample slip away. Go hunt it ASAP!

name: Old World Monster in the New World
request_text: We've finally tracked down the source of those mysterious tracks. Report to the Coral Highlands and seek it out! I'll be expecting your report as soon as you're done!

name: Special Arena: HR Pukei-Pukei
request_text: A new challenger: Pukei-Pukei, the Toxic Tussler, the Lickin' Machine! He won't listen when you say "no tongues"! The gloves are off—not that we have gloves that big...

name: Special Arena: HR Barroth
request_text: A new challenger: Barroth, the Hulking Headbutt, the Skullcracker! Lose to this guy, and your name is mud! The gloves are off—not that we have gloves that big...

name: Special Arena: HR Tobi-Kadachi
request_text: A new challenger: Tobi-Kadachi, the Leaping Lizard, the Bitemaster! He'll clean your clock with thunder shocks! The gloves are off—not that we have gloves that big...

name: Special Arena: HR Anjanath
request_text: A new challenger: Anjanath, the Jaws of Death, the Stompasaurus! He's just stopped by for a quick bite! The gloves are off—not that we have gloves that big...

name: Special Arena: HR Rathian
request_text: A new challenger: Rathian, the Queen o' Green, the Skyborne Slasher! Don't get the lady angry; she's poison! The gloves are off—not that we have gloves that big...

name: Special Arena: HR Paolumu
request_text: A new challenger: Paolumu, the Punishing Puffball, the Fearigible! It may not be fair, but he's walking on air! The gloves are off—not that we have gloves that big...

name: Special Arena: HR Radobaan
request_text: A new challenger: Radobaan, the Roto-Ravager, the Grinder! Better dodge fast, or you'll be boned! The gloves are off—not that we have gloves that big...

name: Left Quite the Impression
request_text: Doesn't the sight of Zorah Magdaros make your heart skip a beat? Let me assure you, seeing its scales close up is just as awe-inspiring. It's imperative that we study it more.

name: Hard to Swallow
request_text: We've gotten a disturbing report of an unusually powerful Great Jagras appearing in the Ancient Forest. Begin your investigation ASAP, but beware its gluttonous appetite!

name: Googly-eyed Green Monster
request_text: We've gotten a disturbing report of an unusually powerful Pukei-Pukei appearing in the Ancient Forest. Begin your investigation ASAP, but beware its poisonous attacks!

name: A Hair-Raising Experience
request_text: We've gotten a disturbing report of an unusually powerful Tobi-Kadachi appearing in the Ancient Forest. Begin your investigation ASAP, but beware its lightning speed!

name: It Can't See You if You Don't Move
request_text: We've gotten a disturbing report of an unusually powerful Anjanath appearing in the Ancient Forest. Begin your investigation ASAP, but beware its fiery attacks!

name: The Sleeping Sylvan Queen
request_text: A major change in the ecosystem is driving monsters from their natural habitats. Head to the Ancient Forest and begin your investigation of the invading Rathian immediately!

name: Stuck in Their Ways
request_text: Those three crazy old scholars went to study a LIVE Tobi- Kadachi. Please go capture it before they hurt themselves! *Unlocks a new Canteen ingredient on first time completion.

name: Keep Your Hands to Yourself!
request_text: We've gotten a disturbing report of an unusually powerful Kulu-Ya-Ku roaming the Wildspire Waste. Begin your investigation ASAP, but beware its clever attacks!

name: A Crown of Mud and Anger
request_text: We've gotten a disturbing report of an unusually powerful Barroth roaming the Wildspire Waste. Begin your investigation ASAP, but beware its mud-caked attacks!

name: Pukei-Pukei Ambush
request_text: A major change in the ecosystem is driving monsters from their natural habitats. Head to the Wildspire Waste and begin your investigation of the invading Pukei-Pukei ASAP!

name: Up to Your Waist in the Waste
request_text: We've gotten a disturbing report of an unusually powerful Jyuratodus appearing in the Wildspire Waste. Begin your investigation ASAP, but beware of getting stuck in the muck!

name: Brown Desert, Green Queen
request_text: We've gotten a disturbing report of an unusually powerful Rathian appearing in the Wildspire Waste. Begin your investigation ASAP, but beware of its poisonous tail!

name: Trespassing Troublemaker
request_text: A major change in the ecosystem is driving monsters from their natural habitats. Head to the Wildspire Waste and begin your investigation of the invading Anjanath ASAP!

name: Say Cheese!
request_text: We've gotten a disturbing report of an unusually powerful Tzitzi-Ya-Ku appearing in the Coral Highlands. Begin your investigation ASAP, but beware its blinding flash attacks!

name: Loop the Paolumu
request_text: We've gotten a disturbing report of an unusually powerful Paolumu appearing in the Coral Highlands. Begin your investigation ASAP, but beware of its airburst attacks!

name: A Tingling Taste
request_text: ...... Why do I want you to hunt a Great Girros? Well, I'll tell you later. I know, how devilish of me. Run along now...

name: Stuck in a Rut
request_text: We've gotten a disturbing report of an unusually powerful Radobaan appearing in the Rotten Vale. Begin your investigation ASAP, but beware of its rolling attacks!

name: Chef Quest! Pumped to Deliver
request_text: Now that you've worked both your upper and lower body, are you ready to put it to good use!? GOOD! Let's Work! *Unlocks a new Canteen ingredient on first time completion.

name: Chef Quest! A Rotten Request
request_text: These little monsters think you're playing with them! Show 'em what you're made of! Let's say... 10 reps? *Unlocks a new Canteen ingredient on first time completion.

name: A Meow for Help
request_text: Every time I try to gather something for my meowster out in the Everstream, these Gastodon knock me on my tail! MEOW-CH! Can you lend a Felyne a paw here?

name: A Scalding Scoop
request_text: I was out on assignment when a Barnos barfed something at me. Whatever it was it was HOT, painfully hot! But also the sells-lots-of-copies kind of hot! Help me get my story!

name: Dodogama Drama
request_text: Hey, we've gotten a report of an unusually fine monster specimen roaming around. We need to seize on this opportunity, so we need you to investigate ASAP!

name: Chef Quest! Gajalaka Lockdown
request_text: Meow my god! Are these lil' guys tryin' to flex on you? Show 'em what you're packin'! Let's say... 10 reps! *Unlocks a new Canteen ingredient on first time completion.

name: A Wound and a Thirst
request_text: The Nergigante's long eyed us from the far side of the Elder Crossing, but now we have a lead on its whereabouts. If we can study it, it may reveal the Crossing's true nature.

name: Special Arena: HR Pink Rathian
request_text: A new challenger: Pink Rathian, the Burning Blossom, the Beauty Who Bites! Best not stop to smell the roses! The gloves are off—not that we have gloves that big...

name: Special Arena: HR Legiana
request_text: A new challenger: Legiana, the Slipstream Striker, the Wingleader! Remember, you can't spell flight without fight! The gloves are off—not that we have gloves that big...

name: Special Arena: HR Odogaron
request_text: A new challenger: Odogaron, the Muscle Mutt, the Rex Who Wrecks! He'll bite your leg to fetch the stick inside! The gloves are off—not that we have gloves that big...

name: Special Arena: HR Uragaan
request_text: A new challenger: Uragaan, the Rolling Rocket, the Chinstigator! Once he starts spinning, uragoner! The gloves are off—not that we have gloves that big...

name: Special Arena: HR Rathalos
request_text: A new challenger: Rathalos, the Red-Hot Raider, the Firestarter! Forgive the fireballs; he likes his meals cooked! The gloves are off—not that we have gloves that big...

name: Special Arena: HR Azure Rathalos
request_text: A new challenger: Azure Rathalos, the Sapphire Sultan, the True Blue Terror! Bow down to the king of all wyverns! The gloves are off—not that we have gloves that big...

name: Special Arena: HR Diablos
request_text: A new challenger: Diablos, the Sandy Stampede, Biggus Diggus! Don't hang around if he's underground! The gloves are off—not that we have gloves that big...

name: Special Arena: HR Black Diablos
request_text: A new challenger: Black Diablos, the Dark Destroyer, the Horn Express! Run, don't walk, from this furious fiend! The gloves are off—not that we have gloves that big...

name: Rathalos Rematch
request_text: We've gotten a disturbing report of another unusually powerful Rathalos in the Ancient Forest. Let that red beast know who REALLY stands atop the food chain here!

name: Rathalos in Blue
request_text: The field team has spotted an Azure Rathalos patroling the skies. Subspecies like these are highly valuable to the Commission's research efforts. Get going, hunter!

name: The Red and Blue Crew
request_text: Here at the Second Fleet, we've been working to develop new tools to help your hunts, but we need YOUR help gathering the materials. We're counting on you to take this quest!

name: Pretty In Pink
request_text: The field team has spotted a Pink Rathian stalking the local wildlife. Subspecies like these are highly valuable to the Commission's research efforts. Get going, hunter!

name: Well, That Diablos!
request_text: We've gotten a disturbing report of an unusually powerful Diablos appearing in the Wildspire Waste. Begin your investigation ASAP, but beware of its charging attacks!

name: Two-horned Hostility
request_text: Hey, we've gotten a report of an unusually fine monster specimen roaming around. We need to seize on this opportunity, so we need you to investigate ASAP!

name: RRRRRumble in the Waste!
request_text: *sigh* I've already told you what I want you to do. Run along now and complete this quest if you want your new toy. *Unlocks a new Specialized Tool on first time completion.

name: A Cherry Wind upon the Reefs
request_text: The field team has spotted a Pink Rathian stalking the local wildlife. Subspecies like these are highly valuable to the Commission's research efforts. Get going, hunter!

name: Legiana: Highlands Royalty
request_text: We've gotten a disturbing report of an unusually powerful Legiana appearing in the Coral Highlands. Begin your investigation ASAP, but beware its swift and icy attacks!

name: A Sore Site
request_text: Ugh! Every time I go out to the highlands to observe my beloved Paolumu, that gnarly monster is there! Please do something! *Unlocks a new Canteen ingredient on first time completion.

name: Talons of Ire and Ice
request_text: There's a spot I'm certain hides the secret to growing Ancient Trees. Unfortunately, two nasty monsters are patrolling that area. *Unlocks a Botanical Research slot on first time completion.

name: Odogaron Unleashed
request_text: We've gotten a disturbing report of an unusually powerful Odogaron appearing in the Rotten Vale. Begin your investigation ASAP, but beware of its powerful claws!

name: Lavasioth, Monster of Magma
request_text: Hey, we've gotten a report of an unusually fine monster specimen roaming around. We need to seize on this opportunity, so we need you to investigate ASAP!

name: Ore-eating Occupier
request_text: We've gotten a report of an unusually fine monster specimen roaming around. We need to seize on this opportunity, so we need you to investigate ASAP!

name: Ruler of the Azure Skies
request_text: The field team has spotted an Azure Rathalos patroling  the skies. Subspecies like these are highly valuable to the Commission's research efforts. Get going, hunter!

name: Bazelgeuse in the Field of Fire
request_text: That eccentric trio has gone and done it again! Now that they've discovered the location of a Bazelgeuse, they're off to study it! Please hunt it before they get themselves hurt!

name: A Fiery Convergence
request_text: Here at the Second Fleet, we've been working to develop new tools to help your hunts, but we need YOUR help gathering the materials. We're counting on you to take this quest!

name: Kushala Daora, Dragon of Steel
request_text: The elder dragon tracks in the forest? Kushala Daora. I'm sure of it. We know it's in the Elder's Recess. For the safety of everyone in Astera, we're counting on you!

name: Teostra the Infernal
request_text: It's Teostra that stalks the Waste—Emperor of flame. And now it sits in wait in the Elder's Recess. Go to it, hunter, and end its searing reign!

name: Hellish Fiend Vaal Hazak
request_text: I'm absolutely positive that the effluvium is controlled by Vaal Hazak. Now to prove my theory once and for all. Go to the vale and seek out Vaal Hazak!

name: Land of Convergence
request_text: An immense energy flows through the New World, and we've found where it all leads to. Go with the Seeker and find out what's there. May the Sapphire Star guide us all.

name: Beyond the Blasting Scales
request_text: This quest courts only those with absolute faith in their abilities. You face two abnormally powerful Bazelgeuse, Defeat them to prove you are a true master of the hunt!

name: Thunderous Rumble in the Highlands
request_text: This quest seeks only those with an unquenchable flame in their chest. Make for the Coral Highlands and investigate the beast swathed in lightning. Beyond it lies true glory.

name: A Portent of Disaster
request_text: Here at the Second Fleet, we've been working to develop new tools to help your hunts, but we need YOUR help gathering the materials. We're counting on you to take this quest!

name: A Blaze on the Sand
request_text: Here at the Second Fleet, we've been working to develop new tools to help your hunts, but we need YOUR help gathering the materials. We're counting on you to take this quest!

name: Lightning Strikes Twice
request_text: Yet another Kirin has shown up and you're just here, playing with your Palico!? We might never get this chance again to study it! Go go GOOOOOO!

name: Stirrings from the Grave
request_text: Vaal Hazak serves its purpose in the life cycle of the New World, but now that it has stirred from its nest of decay, it threatens to ruin the whole ecosystem. It must be stopped!

name: The Eater of Elders
request_text: Nergigante is one helluva beast, and still so much we don't know 'bout it. Which is why I need you! If we're lucky, we might get to see two elder dragons squaring off!

name: Master of the Gale
request_text: Did you know that some cultures worship Kushala Daora as a god of wind? Luckily, we're not one of them! I'm determined to study its mastery of flight...just think of the benefits!

name: Hellfire's Stronghold
request_text: Teostra. Just saying the name makes my quill tip quiver. Some believe it's bad luck to cut the fur from this regal beast, but for the sake of the future, we must study it!

name: The Winds of Wrath Bite Deep
request_text: We've got a Kushala Daora running 'round, tearin' things up. Seems like it was kicked out of its territory. Question is, what did the kickin'? Time to investigate!

name: The Fires of Hell Bite Deep
request_text: We've got a riled up Teostra on the warpath. Seems like it was kicked out of its kingdom. Question is, what did the kickin'? Time to investigate!

name: A Light Upon the River's Gloom
request_text: Xeno'jiiva is such a marvelous, mysterious example of exotic monster biology. We could study it for a hundred years if we just had enough samples! That's your cue, Hunter.

name: The White Winds of the New World
request_text: To the hunter who has conquered every investigation, I offer this, the ultimate quest. Enter the Special Arena and take on the New World. Use all that lies before you, and claim glory.

name: The Sapphire Star's Guidance
request_text: To the unparalleled hunter, I offer this final quest. Return to the Elder's Recess and brave the elders' onslaught. Use all within your grasp to prove yourself master of the New World.

name: Showdown: the Muck and the Maul
request_text: Here at the Second Fleet, we've been working to develop new tools to help your hunts, but we need YOUR help gathering the materials. We're counting on you to take this quest!

name: New World Sky, New World Flower
request_text: Here at the Second Fleet, we've been working to develop new tools to help your hunts, but we need YOUR help gathering the materials. We're counting on you to take this quest!

name: A Summons from Below
request_text: Here at the Second Fleet, we've been working to develop new tools to help your hunts, but we need YOUR help gathering the materials. We're counting on you to take this quest!

name: Arena Quest 02
request_text: In the monster corner: Kulu-Ya-Ku, the Pulverizer, the Peckanizer! If this bird is the word, then the word is SMASH! Who's got the guts to fight it with set weapons and armor?

name: Arena Quest 03
request_text: In the monster corner: Rathian, the Queen o' Green, the Skyborne Slasher! Don't get the lady angry; she's poison! Who's got the guts to fight her with set weapons and armor?

name: Arena Quest 04
request_text: In the monster corner: Tzitzi-Ya-Ku, the Saurian Stunner, the Flashinator! This beastie's hot to trot and fine to shine! Who's got the guts to fight it with set weapons and armor?

name: Arena Quest 05
request_text: In the monster corner: Barroth, the Hulking Headbutt, the Skullcracker! Lose to this guy, and your name is mud! Who's got the guts to fight it with set weapons and armor?

name: Arena Quest 06
request_text: In the monster corner: Dodogama, the Behemoth of Boom, the Cruncher! What blows up, must bring you down! Who's got the guts to fight it with set weapons and armor?

name: Arena Quest 07
request_text: In the monster corner: Azure Rathalos, the Sapphire Sultan, the True Blue Terror! Bow down to the king of all wyverns! Who's got the guts to fight it with set weapons and armor?

name: Arena Quest 08
request_text: In the monster corner: A Radobaan-Uragaan tag team! The wheels are turning, and your number's up! Who's got the guts to fight 'em with set weapons and armor?

name: Arena Quest 09
request_text: In the monster corner: A Diablos-Black Diablos tag team! Ever had your ears pierced? Now try the extreme version! Who's got the guts to fight 'em with set weapons and armor?

name: Arena Quest 01
request_text: In the monster corner: Pukei-Pukei, the Toxic Tussler, the Lickin' Machine! He won't listen when you say "no tongues"! Who's got the guts to fight it with set weapons and armor?

name: Troubled Troupers
request_text: "We Troupers are getting batterfanged by two Tzitzi-Ya-Ku.  Please har-meow-nize with our warriors to wallop them into  hightailing it!" (Translation by the Lynian Researcher)

name: Infernal Monarchy
request_text: I don't know how it happened, but we have the chance to observe Teostra and Lunastra behavior in the Wildspire Waste! This is something we can't miss! Go see for yourself, but don't get hurt!

name: Blue Prominence
request_text: I was out studying the feeding habits of some seriously cute local fauna when—WOWZERS—a gigantic blue elder dragon appears! Take care of it so I can get back to research that matters!

name: Today's Special: Hunter Flambé
request_text: Partner, we're part of the food chain too if you think about it. And that's bad news for us if a Deviljho gets a hankering for a hunter burger! So, let's hunt it down before we're lunch!

name: Vespoid Infestation!
request_text: Oh deeeear! I placed some monster repellent around here, but it started attracting giant Vespoids too! Someone, anyone, I need an exterminator! - 2nd Fleet Architect, Client

name: Down the Dark, Muddy Path
request_text: I heard rumors of a powerful monster dwelling in this place. One clad in an armor of earth. you must be like myself, seeking a rival that will force you to surpass your limits. It's time to fight! - Martial Artist in White, Client

name: Gajalaka Outbreak!
request_text: Geez, I just wanted to study the Gajalaka language, so I brought a group of them with me, but they all ran away! Can you help me round them up before they get into trouble? - Shy Scholar, Client

name: Empress in Full Bloom I
request_text: They say there's a monster as pink as the cherry blossoms around these parts, is that true!? Let's see who's the strongest, you, me, or that monsters! Winner gets a prize! - Super Female Martial Artist, Client

name: Empress in Full Bloom II
request_text: They say there's a monster as pink as the cherry blossoms around these parts, is that true!? Let's see who's the strongest, you, me, or that monsters! Winner gets a prize! - Super Female Martial Artist, Client

name: Empress in Full Bloom III
request_text: They say there's a monster as pink as the cherry blossoms around these parts, is that true!? Let's see who's the strongest, you, me, or that monsters! Winner gets a prize! - Super Female Martial Artist, Client

name: The Hunter and the Blue Empress
The Awakened Satsui No Hado I
request_text: Hah, you've come to fight a real boss of a dragon, eh? Don't worry, I won't say a word about this. You Just go and stop that thing with all you've got! - Martial Artist in Red, Client

name: The Awakened Satsui No Hado II
request_text: Hah, you've come to fight a real boss of a dragon, eh? Don't worry, I won't say a word about this. You Just go and stop that thing with all you've got! - Martial Artist in Red, Client

name: The Awakened Satsui No Hado III
request_text: Hah, you've come to fight a real boss of a dragon, eh? Don't worry, I won't say a word about this. You Just go and stop that thing with all you've got! - Martial Artist in Red, Client

name: Up at the Crack of Dawn
request_text: "Our friendly Kestodon have blown a gasket, so we let them cool off in your Arena. Research Commission friends, please see if they've settled down." (Translation by the Lynian Researcher) - Elite Defender, Client

name: Chew the Fat
request_text: Yo, got a quest for you, but don't worry, this is right up your alley. We got a couple of Great Jagras that need to be taken care of. Trust me, the rewards will be worth it. - Field Team Leader, Client

name: USJ: Gold Star Treatment
request_text: USJ is pleased to bring you the most exciting attraction ever! Witness this grand world in all of its golden glory! You'll be presented with some fantastic equipment once you're done! - Stupendous Crew, Client

name: Where Sun Meets Moon
request_text: I heard there's a period of time when diurnal and nocturnal ndemic life meet, so I wanted to see for myself, but now I'm in a jam! (Special ticket and increased rare material rewards) - I Hate This Forkin' Forest, Client

name: Ya-Ku With That?
request_text: Hunter, these two meownsters are su-purr good at stealing eggs and dropping wingdrakes in a flash. But purrhaps they'll make for good equipment too, mew get me? - Canteen Felyne, Client

name: Greeting the Gluttons
request_text: Huh? Yeah, this is a quest from the Meowscular Chef. Whoa, you'll go instead of me? Wow, thank a bunch! To show my gratitude, the next meal's on me! - Fiver Bro, Client

name: Lessons of the Wild
request_text: It's time for some special training. Wingdrakes are feeble things compared to larger monsters, but even they can take down a hunter. Cull their numbers and we'll prep some new Palico gear. - Nora Outcast, Client

name: Every Hunter's Dream
request_text: A hunter came by with a blueprint of a weapon he wanted. I still have the prints lying around, so if you want one of your own, get me the materials and I'll start workin'.

name: Flesh Cleaved to Bone
request_text: So...let me get this straight, you're going to step into the arena and get between Fido and its chew toy? Teaching it to play dead, are we? - Third Fleet Master, Client

name: The Poison Posse
request_text: They say the most beautiful of chalices are poisonous. But I don't think that applies to flying wyverns. But just in case, look into that for me. - Cheerful Scholar, Client

name: Wicked Wildspire Warfare
request_text: Do you know what'll happen if we get a couple of highly territorial monsters in one spot? No? Neither do I! Let's find out. Come out on top to earn Armor Spheres! - Smart Biologist, Client

name: Kirin the Myth
request_text: I looked left, it appeared on the right. I glanced behind me, it showed up in front of me. When I thought there was one of them, there were two. I'm outmatched here. This task is all yours. - Field Team Grizzled Hunter, Client

name: Wiggle Me This
request_text: Wha--hey, don't throw that net on me, I'm not a Wiggler! Fooled you, eh? If you want something like what I'm wearing, then you'll have to help me with my research! - Endemic Life Researcher, Client

name: Scrapping with the Shamos
request_text: I'm getting bombarded with requests left n' right for the stuff I'm wearing, but I'm gonna need some special materials to meet demand. That's your cue, Hunter. You know what to do. - Second Fleet Master, Client

name: Egg Lovers United
request_text: While out gathering egg specimens, a familiar shadow took me unawares. But I believe we can use this for our own purposes! Study the Kulu-Ya-Ku's behavioral patterns, and report back! - Analytic Researcher, Client

name: Midnight Mayhem
request_text: The heck, am I lost? I don't recognize this place. Oh well, I might as well have some fun while I'm here!" (Translation by the Lynian Researcher) (Special ticket rewards) - Tribe Outlaw, Client

name: The Proving
request_text: We've waited so long for this day. It's time for you to participate in the Proving and become a true brave. Offer your trophy to the All-Mother, and you shall be blessed generously. - Nora High Matriarch, Client

name: Triple Threat Throwdown
request_text: This is a quest that I've prepared...just for you. You won't believe how many decorations you'll get if you can complete this quest! Now, show me what you got! - Timid Fiver, Client

name: Gaze Upon the Dawn
request_text: Whenever I see Zorah Magdaros, I can't help but feel sad, and a bit homesick. Let's finish up our research so I can go back to the Old World and meet my master and former teammates again! - Excitable A Lister, Client

name: A Flash in the Pan
request_text: My dear sister and I were suffering from poor eyesight, but the Second Fleet Master crafted us some fine spectacles. I'll give mine to you if you help me test them out! - Analytics Director, Client

name: A Royal Pain
request_text: I wouldn't mind goin home, but I hate all the ryal hubbub that goes with it. Fiver, remind me why I joined the Fifth. (Special ticket and increased rare material rewards) - Client, Former Imperial Princess

name: USJ Blazing Azure Stars!
request_text: USJ is pleased to present the most EXPLOSIVE show ever! Our twin blue stars will show you a dance like you've never seen before! Complete our challenge, and earn some fantastic armor! - Stupendous Crew, Client

name: A Rush of Blood
request_text: Oh no! There's this big ol' monster that looks a lot like our Rush! Someone's gotta calm the big boy down! Help us out, and we'll give you some special gear for your Palico! - Girl with Green Ribbon, Client

name: This Is How Revolts Start
request_text: This is preposterous! Why can't I gather Kingly Cactus in peace!? This is beyond annoying, it's an uprising I tell you! Go out there and see for yourself - Chief Botanist, Client

name: Rollin' With The Uragaan
request_text: Urk, my head is still spinning from what I just saw. We need someone to take out these troublemakers before anyone else gets queasy. Complete this quest for a lot of Armor Spheres! - Serious Handler, Client

name: Coral Waltz
request_text: The monsters roaming the Coral Highlands seem intent on facing off with each other. This could be a huge boon for our research. Hunters, don't let this opportunity pass us by! - Commander, Client

name: Deep Green Blues
request_text: The monsters lurking deep in the Ancient Forest seem intent on facing off with each other. This could be a huge boon for our research. Hunters, don't let this opportunity pass us by! - Commander, Client

name: Effluvial Opera
request_text: The monsters roaming the Rotten Vale seem intent on facing off with each other. This could be a huge boon for our research. Hunters, don't let this opportunity pass us by! - Commander, Client

name: Wildspire Bolero
request_text: The monsters roaming the Wildspire Waste seem intent on facing off with each other. This could be a huge boon for our research. Hunters, don't let this opportunity pass us by! - Commander, Client

name: Rock N' Roll Recess
request_text: The monsters roaming the Elder's Recess seem intent on facing off with each other. This could be a huge boon for our research. Hunters, don't let this opportunity pass us by! - Commander, Client

name: Code: Red
request_text: Legends say in a far off land, a demon hunter in a red coat offed demons with a sickeningly sweet style. How about we make a legend out of you too? If you're interested, jump in. - Stylish Red Fiver, Client

name: A Simple Task
request_text: While gathering samples out in the field, I noticed a number of rare tracks. I need a capable hunter to investigate these tracks, plus gather the rest of my samples!

name: Tracking the Delivery
request_text: While gathering samples out in the field, I noticed a number of rare tracks. I need a capable hunter to get the remainder of my samples, plus gather these tracks! - Scholar on the Scene, Client

name: No Tomorrow for Usurpers
request_text: Our guys spotted the big, ugly flying nuisance in the Elder's Recess! Get your gear, we need you out here ASAP! (Bonus HR points rewarded upon completion.) - The Admiral, Client

name: Relish the Moment
request_text: We've discovered an insanely fierce Deviljho! It seems the cause of his bad mood is his diet of Streamstones. Quell the beast, and take those Streamstones for yourself! - Analytics Director, Client

name: A Nose for an Eye
request_text: In my day, we didn't need these Scoutflies to track down monsters, but this is the New World... I've located some interesting monsters for you. Go get them. (Bonus HR points rewarded upon completion.) - The Huntsman, Client

name: Keeper of the Otherworld
request_text: During my research, I came across a river. Just as I was about to swim across, I spotted some kind of supernatural light. Its existence defied all explanation. Help me unravel this mystery. - Third Fleet Senior Scholar, Client

name: Snow & Cherry Blossoms
request_text: Hey, I came across a couple of truly terrifying monsters in the Coral Highlands. Thought you might be interested! - The Tracker, Client

name: Banquet in the Earthen Hall
request_text: The mother goddess has appeared again, but now that we have the Fifth here, we can finally complete the investigation that we started decades ago! We're counting on you kids! - Admiral, Client

name: A Visitor from Eorzea (Extreme)
request_text: Another Behemoth has appeared in the Elder's Recess and is even more dangerous than the last! Summon other adventurers and quell the beast! (Extremely difficult! Rewards: Drachen layered armor and guild card title) - Serious Handler, Client

name: A Whisper of White Mane
request_text: At first I thought it was an illusion, staring down at me. That white mist gave me chills I'll never forget. I need your help to confirm my findings. - Long Black haired Hunter, Client

name: The Deathly Quiet Curtain
request_text: The truly horrifying things are the ones sleeping in silence, no? But what could it be? the Third Fleet urges you to press on, to lift the curtain off of this mystery and feed our obsession. - Third Fleet Master, Client

name: The Scorn of the Sun
request_text: When I first fought a Teostra back in the Old World, my fear washed over me, but it gave me the fire to fight. But now I realized it's calmness, not fear, that you need to slay it. - Fourth Fleet A-Lister, Client

name: The Eye of the Storm
request_text: Kushala's existence reminds us of how great and fearful nature is. But it also reminds us of those who stood up against the beast. Stand tall hunter, and return the skies to blue. - Excitable A-Lister, Client

name: The Thronetaker
request_text: I finally got permission from Botanical Research to go out in the field. My partners and I stumbled upon a Teostra, Lunastra AND Nergigante! My luck freakin' sucks? I need a nap... - That's the New World for you!, Client

name: The Food Chain Dominator
request_text: The Deviljho is a frightening presence that takes the idea of the food chain and crush it between its massive jaws! Now it's here in the New World. It's time to get investigating! - Eccentric Trio, Client

name: The Blazing Sun
request_text: A Team has spotted Teostra in the Wildspire Waste. I say it's an opportune time to go and have an audience with the infernal emperor, wouldn't you say? - The Huntsman, Client

name: Pandora's Arena
request_text: There's a saying about a cornered animal that slips me mind. Either way, there's wounded Teostora corralled in the Special Arena. Something's up with it. Go and check it out, eh? - Second Fleet Master, Client

name: No Remorse, No Surrender
request_text: I never thought I'd live to see both the emperor and his empress in one spot. Its only fitting that you have the honor of ending their reign. - The Huntsman, Client

name: A Visitor from Another World
request_text: My weirdo partner won't shut up about some non-animal animal he found in the Wildspire Waste. Do you wanna tag along? Whatever it is, it's bound to be something interesting!

name: The Legendary Beast
request_text: Some kind of beast has arrived in the New World due to the instability of the aether. We have to do something otherwise every living thing in the New World is in serious danger!

name: He Taketh It With His Eyes
request_text: It was a Behemoth, an Eorzean beast, in the Elder's Recess. Heed the moogle's advice, call upon other trustworthy hunt--- adventurers to help quell this terror!
